content: X-CF S23 Concrete nails with washer Single nail with steel washer for use with powder actuated tools on concrete ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Nails- - - ### FEATURES:Features 23 mm steel washer – clamps wood to concrete Suitable for economical wood installation with Hiltis powder-actuated tools and cartridges Applications Attaching 2x4s (non-punctuated) to concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete Minimum thickness of base material (concrete): 80 mm Corrosion protection: 5 - 20 µm Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Masonry (solid limestone brick) | Minimum thickness of base material (concrete) | 80 mm | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Material | Carbon steel | Washer size | 29/32 in | Point type | Cut point | Approvals | COLA, ICC-ES | For use with (tools) | DX 2, DX 5, DX 6 ### ITEMS- 244774 - Economy fastener X-CF 72 P8S23 bulk - Package Size 1000 pc
